entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON

SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT
